root: ^[*sigh*] If I could just hear that music one more time…
^My name’s Fig and I promise I won’t eat you, so don’t go peckin’ at me.
^The most important raccoon in the whole world was just taken from me by some humans in a white van.
^Do you know where they might have taken him, sir?
^You not from around here, are you, kid?
^Those humans that took your little friend were ‘Animal Control.’
^I don't personally know much about them…
^But I do know someone who might know more.
^But I need a favor from you first. That’s how it’s done in the city.
^But I need to find Broccoli before the humans eat him!
^No humans are gonna eat your little friend. Humans are strange, but cool creatures, man.
^There was this old man who used to play piano in his nest every day. I made my nest by his just to hear him play.
^But since a few days ago, I haven’t heard any of his beautiful music and I miss it with all my heart.
^If I could hear it one more time, then I’ll tell you everything I know.
^Hold on, Broccoli! I’m gon’ find you like a hog finds mud!
